creator: keiron@aftexsw.com
text:
When using an SVG font the character may be clipped. According to the spec the 
character should not be clipped at all.

In the attached example the character definition has a thick line at the bottom 
that is clipped.
The clipping does not occur when there are other non-defined characters in the 
text element.

The problem is as a result of incorrect bounds being used.

creator: keiron@aftexsw.com
text:
Created attachment 2117
svg test containing svg font that displays problem
